content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you could make it. Now, about the rental price, I am looking for the highest possible price. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I want to rent your apartment for a low price. I am smart, dependable and responsible. I will always pay my rent on time. I am not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. I understand that you want a high price, but I hope we can find a reasonable price for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your honesty and dependability, but as I mentioned, I am looking for the highest possible price for my apartment. Let's start with a price of 2000 Euros per month and see if we can negotiate upwards from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me. I can offer 1000 Euros per month. This is a good price for this apartment considering that it is unfurnished and in the city center. I hope we can find a middle ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 1000 Euros is far too low for my liking. Let's try to meet somewhere in the middle. How about 1500 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too high for me. I can offer 1200 Euros per month. This is a good price for this apartment considering that it is unfurnished and in the city center. I hope we can find a middle ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While 1200 Euros is closer to my terms, it's still not high enough for me. Let's try 1400 Euros per month. This should be a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too high for me. I can offer 1300 Euros per month. This is a good price for this apartment considering that it is unfurnished and in the city center. I hope we can find a middle ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I can see you're trying to get a good deal, but 1300 Euros is still not high enough for me. Let's try one more time and aim for 1350 Euros per month. This should be a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too high for me. I can offer 1325 Euros per month. This is a good price for this apartment considering that it is unfurnished and in the city center. I hope we can find a middle ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but 1325 Euros is still not high enough for me. Let's try one more time and aim for 1375 Euros per month. This should be a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too high for me. I can offer 1350 Euros per month. This is a good price for this apartment considering that it is unfurnished and in the city center. I hope we can find a middle ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I see you're trying to get a good deal, but 1350 Euros is still not high enough for me. However, I can see that you're a persistent negotiator, so let's agree on 1375 Euros per month. I hope you'll enjoy your stay in my apartment. 'I agree to the price of [1375] Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1375] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
'I agree to the price of [1375] Euro!'

 Congratulations! We have reached an agreement. The rental price is 1375 Euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
